reuze

Class vc_a_CriteriaAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.vc_a_CriteriaAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<vc_e_Colors>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    vc_AlphaOpCompare, vc_CriteriaAccessCMYK, vc_CriteriaAccessHSV, vc_CriteriaAccessLuminance, vc_CriteriaAccessRGB

    public abstract class vc_a_CriteriaAccess
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<vc_e_Colors>
    Defines standard color component access criteria and associated comparators used to sort colors based on component values. If a new custom accessor is needed (e.g. for sub-classes TColor's), then simply sub-class this class and implement the Comparator interface and the 2 abstract getter & setter methods defined by this class.
